name: Fast Frittata

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning

preparation: Heat a frying pan over medium-high heat, stir-fry bell pepper for 5 minutes, or until softened.
Sprinkle with Fajita Seasoning and cheese. Top with eggs. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Cover and cook on low heat until eggs are set.
Place bell pepper in a Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave for 1 minute.
Add Fajita Seasoning and cheese. Top with eggs. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve on 1⁄2 cup mixed greens with a side parfait of 3⁄4 cup 2% plain Greek yogurt and 1 cup berries.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Bruschetta Seasoning
summary: An aromatic blend of basil, garlic and parsley.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
